i love this game alot. i use to play it over and over and over. on the xbox 360 and it was my childhood. i loved playing this game and i recommend it to anyone that loves good endings and good storys. this is a game where you you spawn in a glass box with a robot talking to you and then a portal opens. you do 3 tests before you can get the "portal" gun you can only fire blue portals. and you shoot portals at walls. and try to complete every level. and the ending is amazing. and i would get portal one and 2 they are both very good games!
It's a great puzzle game with perfectly refined mechanics

你能想到一个主角全程一句话也没有有且只有一个机器人为数不多的台词玩法是3D版推箱子的游戏获得年度剧情大奖吗? 我反正 没想到！

当我站在玻璃板上驶向火海中时，我以为这就是结局，还准备很坦然的面对。然而，WTF，我不需要死吗？好吧，上去后让我躺在地上等同类来救我，虽然没找到躺下的方法，但我还是乖乖站好♂等待同类，然而，WTF，我又被耍了？原谅我太单纯了。虽然后边一直被警告，墙上还被乱涂乱画：the cake is lie. 但我怎么可能放弃，boss打了两遍终于通关，也如愿以偿的见到了蛋糕，虽然还没吃就被掐灭了。结尾的歌一响起，我就情不自禁的笑了。再加上萌萌的配图，让我对这个boss真是又爱又恨。最后，感谢这精彩的5个小时。

評判通り面白いです。
ただ、人生で初めての３Ｄ酔いを体験して続行できなくなり、途中で中断している状態で、続きをプレイするのを躊躇います。
すごく良いアクションパズルゲームだとは思うのですが、思い出しただけで気分が悪くなる程度にはトラウマになっています。
ポータルをくぐった瞬間に視界がぐるんぐるんするのがかなりキツいです。
体調が良い日に再チャレンジします。

Portal is a first person puzzle game where you are armed with a device that can create blue and orange portals. Step into one portal and you exit out the other. Your task is to escape each test chamber by opening and reaching the door but of course there are many obstacles in the way: pressure plates, seemingly out of reach ledges, acid pools, killer security robots and a humourous rogue AI that really has no qualms about killing you or even worse, making snide remarks about your weight.

With a great game design and a fantastic sense of humour, I highly recommend this game.

One of my favourite games ever. This game provides hours of fun and an amazing story for $10. 

The story is so great and I am so emotionally attached to this game franchise. I did not take my time buying the second game. 

This is my second favourite valve game.

[b]Story / Plot:[/b] 10/10 Original and interesting.
[b]Characters / Character Designs:[/b] 10/10 I loved how scary yet... amazing GlaDOS looked. Same with the turrents. They aren't character but the robot designs were coOOl. I was gonna talk about Portal 2 but you won't get it until you play it.
[b]Level / Area design:[/b] 9/10. I love the polished look and furturistic feels of the levels. I didn't like the places OUTSIDE the testing chambers. They're supposed to look good but I HATED looking at it everytime I died and had to respawn.[edit: I got over it very quickly though and I know it's apart of the look. On my first play-through I was like "NO WHY".]

I really suggest getting this game and if you're reading this between 26-28th of November (of 2017) GET IT NOW WHILE IT'S ON SALE. It's such a low price for an amazing game and tbh its a really good bargain.

I just finished the game and if you are looking for info about whether or not you want the game I 100% recommend it. It is absolutly outstanding and if you love puzzels then you will love it even more.
